thread.title: Exclusive: Video reveals brutal reality inside NSW prisons - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Exclusive: Video reveals brutal reality inside NSW prisons - Yahoo7

author: Lee Jeloscek
title: Exclusive: Video reveals brutal reality inside NSW prisons - Yahoo7
text:
Share Exclusive: Video reveals brutal reality inside NSW prisons - Yahoo7 Prisons are built to house the worst of the worst with thousands of violent offenders under guard. Close Graphic video shows violent effect of prison brawls UP NEXT VIDEO Graphic video shows violent effect of prison brawls. Source: 7 News Graphic video shows violent effect of prison brawls 
Seven News can show just how ugly it can get on the inside through an exclusive graphic video. 
It shows how quickly brawls can erupt but also how brave many of those who work there need to be. 
Video shows a Friday night just before Christmas, but the inmates at Wellington prison were feeling anything but festive. 
A brawl erupts between two prisoners, with others joining the fracas. 
One man swings from the rails to get involved, rushing into the melee under the stairs which spills past men slapping each other. 
“Ned Kelly was a gentleman compared to these blokes,” NSW Corrections Minister David Elliott said.
